Row.Text: Blessings be to you weary traveler! I am Saint Stephen of Perm, and I welcome you to my lands. Would you care to trade?
Welcome to the lands of Perm, friend, I am Saint Stephen. If it's trade you seek, you have come to the right place!
Perm once again fades into darkness, but our name will live on. You would have gained more wealth from working with us, friend.
